name: Ground Turkey and Wild Rice Soup
author: Tracy Czarny
summary: I was looking for healthier ground turkey recipes and came up with this ground turkey soup with rice. I serve this with a fresh French bread. It also freezes really well!
ingredients: 2 tablespoons salted butter, or to taste
4 cups chicken broth, or more to taste
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir ground turkey in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat; stir in carrots, onion, celery, and garlic
Cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 10 minutes
Add broth, milk, parsley, thyme, and pepper
Stir in turkey and bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 30 minutes
Stir in rice and cook until heated through, about 5 minutes
